name: Mr. Thin
description:
Ever wondered what it feels like when the world is closing in on you? Have you ever dreamed in black and white or jumped through different worlds? Is he a beam of light, a ghost, an alien or just a collection of shapes, you be the judge.
The legend that defies it all is Mr. Thin.

-One touch controls it all with a double jump when needed.
-Like reality you only have only one life to live so make the most of it and jump.
-Avoid getting crushed and collect points as you travel into the unknown.
